subject: oem_ibm: Operator Panel trigger function support
commitMessage:
oem_ibm: Operator Panel trigger function support

This commit adds changes to fetch the enabled/disabled
trigger functions from the host and pass that bitmap value
to the D-Bus API introduced by the PanelApp.

Signed-off-by: Sagar Srinivas <sagar.srinivas@ibm.com>
Change-Id: I65582dc1a6a316f1268f7543825974a9e9db6da6

dbus method calls typically require different types of arguments in general , which is why we did not come up with the util function for that.

This function is not a generic function - i would suggest to remove this util function and use it directly in your consumer code.
Done
needs cleanup
Done

this will not be needed is isHostPdrModified can be accessible from the libpldmresponder/platform.cpp.

So please make this a public variable.
Done
this can be removed, the oemPlatformHandler already has a repo pointer.
Done
instead of making this private, we can make this public & then use hostPDRHandler->isHostPdrModified from the libpldmresponder/pltaform.cpp
Done
can be removed
Done
const reference.
Done
we cannot always assume that , we have the index 1. This will lead to a segfault.
Done
const reference missing.
Done
same exact logic was written in the oem_ibm_handler.hpp , can you re-use the the code ? rather than duplicating.
Done

this is not needed, please remove 

PLDM_ENTITY_CHASSIS_FRONT_PANEL_BOARD | 0x8000 => will give 32837
Done

this should ideally not be hardcoded,
https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/c30a82cf349bffe24d1f582a383e72aa41ed6e71/common/utils.cpp#L30

seems like the tid is not even considered while getting the effecter
will be removing this block of code, as we do not want to be setting bitmap here and only when we receive the PLDM_RECORDS_MODIFIED event from host.
this should be just pdrRepo, if pdrRepo is just const pldm_repo*
will be removing this block of code, as we do not want to be setting bitmap here and only when we receive the PLDM_RECORDS_MODIFIED event from host.
this does not look like an ideal fit for a util funtion, because it is pretty specific for this use case alone.
will be removing this block of code, as we do not want to be setting bitmap here and only when we receive the PLDM_RECORDS_MODIFIED event from host.
repo is already a class variable, we dont need to send this again.
Done
this needs to be a const ref to the pdr repository - there are some other commits in the chain that are using the const ref.
Done
